Text:
Another one of great clashes of early 80's. It is really pitty that this sixers team have won just one NBA title with all this great tallents - Dr. J, Sir Charles, Moses, Morice Cheeks, Andrew Toney...
Another great contribution. Thank you Nepotu!
I like your comment, ivo1978, and I agree. Pitty that much more old games have been lost in mega up shutdown.
merci Nepotu - blocked @ 49.4%... ivo1978 is right - amazing 76ers in the 80's... take care both...
Welcome, jmbsc! You have been stocked because of me. I'm back now.
no worries man.. back on it now... :-) sampled it - looks quite good to watch... will seed for sure... you take care

thanks guys, it's always good to see that there is still someone who appreciate real good backetball. If i have to be honest I prefer to watch this old games even if I now the final outcome then, for example, all star weekend 2012.
thanks again and take care!
Thank you guys, both of you, for your appreciation.
